SEO.home_page_description: Tomasz Jelito - Full Stack Developer | Design and development of websites and web applications | Comprehensive solutions | Personalized approach | Cooperation
SEO.contact_page_description: Write to me! I am happy to answer all your questions.
SEO.about_page_description: Hi, my name is Tomasz Jelito and I'm a full-stack web developer from Poland. Programming is my passion. I enjoy working with creative people and learning new things. I love sport and travelling.
SEO.portfolio_page_description: Check out my recent portfolio projects.

HeroSection.content: I design, develop and deploy websites and web applications

ContactMe.content: I'm happy to answer all your questions
ContactMe.name: Name
ContactMe.working_hours: When I get up - when I go to sleep
ContactMe.email_sent: Thank you for your message! I will write you back soon
ContactMe.form_error: Oops... Something didn't work. Please write to me directly: jeli@jeli.pl

AboutMe.title: Who Am I?
AboutMe.content: Hi, my name is Tomasz Jelito and I am a full stack web developer from Poland. I graduated from a technical school with an IT specialization in May 2024 and since then I have been pursuing my dream career as a freelancer. Traveller at heart. Athlete by passion. Aspiring indie creator.

MyCompetence.title: Experience
MyCompetence.description1: First commercial projects as a full stack web developer
MyCompetence.description2: During this time I gained a lot of knowledge and did two internships
MyCompetence.description3: I spent hundreds of hours learning the basics of C++ and algorithms from youtube

WhatDoIDo.description1_1: My primary business is creating websites for companies.
WhatDoIDo.description2_1: Do you need an additional programmer for your project? Or maybe you have an idea for a new application? Contact me! I'm open to all new interesting ideas.
WhatDoIDo.description2_2: I can help you with both:
WhatDoIDo.description3_1: After hours I work on SaaS products, share knowledge and develop simple games.
WhatDoIDo.description3_2: Check out my blog where I document my journey as a young entrepreneur:

CallToAction.title: Got a job for me?
CallToAction.description: Are you looking for a freelancer to develop your new website? Or maybe you need an extra programmer on your team?

PortfolioProjects.title: Check out my recent projects
PortfolioProjects.agency_description: One of my old demo websites from early 2023. For this project I used Next JS and Mantine UI. You can check out the source code on my github:
PortfolioProjects.portfolio_description: My portfolio website you are looking at right now. For this project I used Next JS and Mantine UI.
PortfolioProjects.akademia_description: Website for a local volleyball academy - "Akademia Siatkówki Dembończyk / Wójtowicz". One of my first commercial projects I completed in May 2023. This website is based on the Wordpress system.
PortfolioProjects.akupunktura_description: Akupunktura Joanna Jelito. Website with appointment booking for acupuncture office. This website is based on Wordpress system.
PortfolioProjects.kniha_description: Jakub Knihinicki - Badminton instructor. Simple website for badminton player and instructor. This website is built using HTML and CSS only.
PortfolioProjects.crisis_coriddor_description: The winning game of Zegluga Game Jam 2023
PortfolioProjects.sudoku_description: Simple sudoku game made with python and tkinter
PortfolioProjects.algorithms_description: This repo contains my implementations (mainly based on book "Introduction to algorithms") of basic algorithms.
PortfolioProjects.qi_description: Demo Wordpress website for a Chinese medicine salon.
PortfolioProjects.furniro_description: Ecommerce landing page for furniture shop. This is not an actual shop, just a demo based on this figma project:
PortfolioProjects.pokojezielonanoc_description: Landing page for a hotel in Polanica-Zdrój. Realisation of the website from a design prepared by jjstudiograficzne.pl
PortfolioProjects.solopreneurpaths_description: My personal blog about the pursuit of financial freedom as a young web developer. Mastering Freelance, One Line of Code at a Time.

ProductsPreview.title: Find your solution
ProductsPreview.description: Do you want to build a website that will help you reach new customers and grow your business? Write to me what you need, I'll help you find the recipe for the success.
ProductsPreview.description1: Show what you do, where people can find you and how to contact you
ProductsPreview.description2: Allow your clients to book their appointments conveniently
ProductsPreview.description3: Sell your products online, reach new customers and increase your sales
ProductsPreview.description4: Need something special? Write to me

CookieConsent.title: I eat your cookies
CookieConsent.description: This website uses essential cookies. By continuing to use the site, you consent to their use.
